profile.details: I am an organized, focused, dedicated, motivated, intelligent, productive and ambitious professional software engineer. I am interested in working with experienced professionals within a team and contribute to the success of a dynamic project development. I am looking for a long-term position.

jobDiscription: Developed end to end, full-stack features for organisation's internal website, which handles agriculture business usecases. Used Java, Spring, Struts, Oracle SQL, PLSql, Teamcity, Ant, Gradle, Nexus, Git, Jira, HTML, CSS, JavaScript for full-stack application development. Followed owasp security principles, SDLC life cycle and agile methodology while developing front-end and back-end features.

Developed new features for existing infrastructure, content and process-oriented proprietary desktop application. Utilizing Java, Swing, MySQL, Docker, Jenkins, Maven, Nexus, Git, Jira, XML, JSON, BASH, HTML, CSS, JavaScript for full-stack application development. Addressing bug fixes and processes for workflow with regards to software systems. Focusing on security, integrity, robustness, and complexity of various software apllications and features. Using Java Spring to provide API driven back-end micro-services.

Developed complex data structures and algorithms for data generation of lottery tickets. Maintained, developed, debugged, and tested complex code base in C++, C. Developed deeper understanding of performance and production-oriented software. Worked as a part of team to efficiently manage and contribute to deadline driven development. Analyzed data of various complexity and successfully fixed issues with respect to data integrity, distribution, and correctness.

education.discription: Full-Stack Developer Diploma from MITT, Manitoba, Canada
Bachelor's in Computer Engineering from GTU, Gujarat, India

tools: Java, Spring Framework, Hibernate, JPA, J2EE, Python, C#, .NET, Entity Framework, MySQL, SQL, PostgreSQL, TensorFlow, Swing Framework, Struts Framework, Perl Scripting, Bash Scripting, JavaScript, React, NodeJS, HTML, DHTML, CSS, jQuery, Docker, Git, Jira, Jenkins, Nexus, Linux, Windows

projects.name: Book-Tracker
projects.discription: This project is a web application for digital library system which helps to keep track of books. This application will conviniently keep track of any books the user wants to read, is currently reading, or has read. This project is built using React.js and uses open sourced back end API.

projects.name: Restaurant-Review
projects.discription: This project is a web-based restaurant finder. It shows the best restaurants near the users's location on a map and showcases comments of previous visitors for that restaurant.

projects.name: Chess
projects.discription: Game of Chess is a multiplayer GitHub hosted website and can be played online. It is built using pure JavaScript to provide logic to the game of chess.
